University

Class UniversityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • University.UniversityController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    University

    public class UniversityController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that creates an array for university objects, contructs universities and adds them to the list

    • Method Detail

      • getListOfSchools

        public java.util.ArrayList<University> getListOfSchools()
        Return the universityList

      • makeUniversity

        public University makeUniversity(java.lang.String schoolName,
                                 java.lang.String state,
                                 java.lang.String location,
                                 java.lang.String control,
                                 int numStudents,
                                 double percentFemale,
                                 double satVerbal,
                                 double satMath,
                                 double tuition,
                                 double percentRecFinAid,
                                 int numApplicants,
                                 double percentAccepted,
                                 double percentEnroll,
                                 int academicScale,
                                 int social,
                                 int qualOfLife,
                                 java.lang.String studyArea1,
                                 java.lang.String studyArea2,
                                 java.lang.String studyArea3,
                                 java.lang.String studyArea4,
                                 java.lang.String studyArea5)
        Constructs university object
        Parameters:
        schoolName - a string containing the school name
        state - a string containing the name of the state
        location - a string containing the name of the schools location
        control - a String specifying who controls the new university
        numStudents - an integer for the number of students at school
        percentFemale - a double out of 100 representing the percentage of females in the student population
        satVerbal - a double out of 800 representing the average SAT Verbal exam score for all students currently enrolled in the new university
        satMath - a double out of 800 representing the average SAT Math exam score for all students currently enrolled in the new university
        tuition - a double representing the annual tuition for the new university
        percentRecFinAid - a double out of 100 representing the percentage of students receiving any form sort of financial assistance from the new university
        numApplicants - an integer representing the number of students who typically apply annually to the new university
        percentAccepted - a double out of 100 representing the percentage of applicants who are admitted annually to the new university
        percentEnroll - a double out of 100 representing the percentage of admitted students who enroll in the new university
        academicScale - an int between 1 and 5 (with 5 being best) indicating the quality of the academics at the new university
        social - an int between 1 and 5 (with 5 being best) indicating the quality of the social life at the new university
        qualOfLife - an int between 1 and 5 (with 5 being best) indicating the overall quality of life at the new university
        studyArea1 - a string containing the name of the study area
        studyArea2 - a string containing the name of the study area
        studyArea3 - a string containing the name of the study area
        studyArea4 - a string containing the name of the study area
        studyArea5 - a string containing the name of the study area
        Returns:
        university object created
